headline.main: World Briefing | Europe: Germany: Wartime Bomb Near Reichstag

lead_paragraph: The dome and observation deck of the Reichstag in Berlin were closed when a Russian bomb from World War II was exposed during construction at a nearby site. Visitors were barred from the popular tourist destination while explosive experts detonated the 50-pound bomb. Desmond Butler (NYT)
abstract: Unexploded Russian bomb from World War II is unearthed during construction near Reichstag in Berlin, Germany, forcing temporary shutdown of building's observation deck (S)
